items.sentence: Do you think I don\'t know about you and Tom?
This umbrella is mine and that one\'s Tom\'s.
Why did you think I didn\'t enjoy doing that?
Why do you think I\'d do something like that?
I\'ve already waited for almost half an hour.
You\'re Tom Jackson\'s daughter, aren\'t you?
Tom waited impatiently for Mary to get ready.
I wish you didn\'t hang out with Tom so much.
I wish you\'d consider coming back to Boston.
I wish you\'d stop calling me your boyfriend.
It wasn\'t long before I got a call from Tom.
It would\'ve been better not to say anything.
It wouldn\'t be safe to go there by yourself.
You\'ve worked with Tom before, haven\'t you?
It may already be too late for us to do that.
It might make things easier if Tom helped us.
It seemed like the only rational thing to do.
Do you think that you could help me fix this?
Tom told Mary he didn\'t have anything to do.
Tom told Mary he didn\'t have to do anything.
Tom had better do what he\'s been told to do.
I told Tom that I wanted to eat Chinese food.
I told Tom where he should put his suitcases.
My house is on the other side of that bridge.
Tom seems to be trying to change the subject.
Tom didn\'t know Mary needed to go yesterday.
There weren\'t many people at Tom\'s concert.
My doctor told me I shouldn\'t drive anymore.
It was the worst pain I had ever experienced.
I wish you\'d told me the car was out of gas.
I wish you\'d told me we were having company.
Tom and Mary wanted to live closer to nature.
Tom and Mary were surprised by what they saw.
Tom was three years old when his father died.
Tom was three years old when his mother died.
What\'s the cheapest place to go on vacation?
I also know the job won\'t be very well done.
Tom never did learn to play guitar very well.
I need to buy Tom something for his birthday.
Tom is someone I\'ve known since high school.
Tom probably needs at least three bodyguards.
Tom was often beaten by his alcoholic father.
Tom was only in Boston for a couple of weeks.
I just wanted to hear you sing one more time.
Tom doesn\'t feel like playing outside today.
Tom picked out a very nice bracelet for Mary.
You have a relationship with Tom, don\'t you?
Tom said something to Mary that made her cry.
What do you think Tom is going to want to do?
Tom speaks French better than he pretends to.
